entry.welcome.toEnter: Per entrare sul server e diventare uno dei suoi membri ufficiali, leggi le informazioni sul canale {information_channel_mention} per prendere un po' di confidenza con il server e le sue linee guida, dopo, clicca sul pulsante sotto.
entry.welcome.acceptedRules: Ho letto le linee guida e accetto di rispettarle
entry.proficiencySelection.chooseProfici: Seleziona il ruolo che descrive con maggiore precisione la tua padronanza del {language}.
entry.proficiencySelection.canChangeRole: Non ti preoccupare se non sei sicuro del tuo livello linguistico, puoi sempre cambiarlo dopo usando il comando {command}.
entry.verification.needToVerify: Prima di poter entrare {guild_name}, devi prima essere verificato rispondendo a delle domande di verifica.
entry.verification.answerHonestly: E' meglio se rispondi onestamente a queste domande, siccome __i rifiuti sono permanenti__ e non potrai inviare altre risposte.
entry.verification.iUnderstand: I understand, and wish to proceed
entry.verification.accountTooNew: Due to security concerns, accounts that are too new may not enter the server.
entry.verification.entryRequestRejectedP: Your entry request has been rejected previously; You cannot join the server.
entry.verification.alreadySubmittedAnswe: You have already submitted answers to the verification questions. You will be notified once your request to join is reviewed by the moderators.
entry.verification.answersSubmitted: Your answers to the verification questions have been submitted.
entry.verification.answersWillBeReviewed: Your request to join the server will be reviewed by the server staff, and you will be notified via DMs when your entry request is accepted.
entry.verification.failedToSubmitAnswers: Failed to submit answers to the verification questions.
entry.verification.accepted: Your request to join {guild_name} has been accepted.
entry.verification.rejected: Your request to join {guild_name} has been rejected. This decision was made by a majority of the server's staff.
entry.verification.notAbleToReturn: You will not be able to return to the server.
entry.vote.alreadyVotedToAccept: You have already voted in favour of this user's entry request being accepted.
entry.vote.alreadyVotedToReject: You have already voted against this user's entry request being accepted.
entry.vote.stanceOnVoteChanged: Your stance in this vote has been changed.
